00178     typedef nitf::ExtensionsIterator Iterator;

00181     Extensions(const Extensions & x)
00182     {
00183         setNative(x.getNative());
00184     }
00185

00188     {
00189         if (&x != this)
00190             setNative(x.getNative());

00196     {
00197         setNative(x);
00198         getNativeOrThrow();
00199     }
00200 
00202     Extensions() throw(nitf::NITFException)
00203     {
00204         setNative(nitf_Extensions_construct(&error));
00205         getNativeOrThrow();
00206         setManaged(false);
00207     }
00208 
00210     nitf::Extensions clone() throw(nitf::NITFException)
00211     {
00212         nitf::Extensions dolly(nitf_Extensions_clone(getNativeOrThrow(), &error));
00213         dolly.setManaged(false);
00214         return dolly;
00215     }
00216 
00217     ~Extensions(){}
00218 
00224     void appendTRE(nitf::TRE & tre) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00225     {
00226         //if the TRE is already managed, we throw an Exception
00227         if (tre.isManaged())
00228             throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("The given TRE is already managed by the library. Try cloning it first."));
00229 
00230         NITF_BOOL x = nitf_Extensions_appendTRE(getNative(),
00231             tre.getNativeOrThrow(), &error);
00232         if (!x)
00233             throw nitf::NITFException(&error);
00234         tre.setManaged(true); //The TRE is now owned by the underlying extensions object
00235     }
00236 
00242     nitf::List getTREsByName(const std::string& name) throw(except::NoSuchKeyException)
00243     {
00244         nitf_List* x = nitf_Extensions_getTREsByName(getNative(), name.c_str());
00245         if (!x)
00246             throw except::NoSuchKeyException();
00247         return nitf::List(x);
00248     }
00249 
00256     void removeTREsByName(const std::string& name)
00257     {
00258         nitf_Extensions_removeTREsByName(getNative(), name.c_str());
00259     }
00260 
00265     void remove(Iterator& iter)
00266     {
00267         nitf_TRE* tre = nitf_Extensions_remove(
00268                             getNative(), &iter.getHandle(), &error);
00269         if (tre) delete tre;
00270     }

00272 
00274     nitf::HashTable getHash()
00275     {
00276         return nitf::HashTable(getNativeOrThrow()->hash);
00277     }
00278 
00280     void setHash(nitf::HashTable & value)
00281     {
00282         //release the currently "owned" one
00283         nitf::HashTable ht = nitf::HashTable(getNativeOrThrow()->hash);
00284         ht.setManaged(false);
00285 
00286         //have the library manage the "new" one
00287         getNativeOrThrow()->hash = value.getNative();
00288         value.setManaged(true);
00289     }
00290 
00295     bool exists(const std::string& key)
00296     {
00297         NITF_BOOL x = nitf_Extensions_exists(getNative(), key.c_str());
00298         return x ? true : false;
00299     }

00306     {
00307         nitf_ExtensionsIterator x = nitf_Extensions_begin(getNative());
00308         return nitf::ExtensionsIterator(x);

00310 
00315     Iterator end()
00316     {
00317         nitf_ExtensionsIterator x = nitf_Extensions_end(getNative());
00318         return nitf::ExtensionsIterator(x);
00319     }
